item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 20 Dec 2022
item.description:
1. B·o·B, an universal and secure peer-to-peer file-transfer in OCaml
  2. OCaml 5.0.0 is out!
  3. ThreadSanitizer support for OCaml 5.0.0 – first public release
  4. Parany for OCaml-5
  5. WebAssembly/Wasm and OCaml, by OCamlPro
  6. opam 2.1.4, opam-publish 2.2.0, opam-file-format 2.1.5
